attributes.action: Allow Ukrainian refugees to enter the UK without a VISA to stay with family.
attributes.additional_details: Due to the invasion of the Ukraine by Russian forces. I believe the UK government has a duty to allow refugees to enter the UK without a VISA to ensure that they are safe from oppression and tyranny.
attributes.background: I want the UK go to grant access to all Ukrainian refugees who have family in the UK to gain access without VISA’s

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
